name: Tumblr Colour Revert January 2019
description: Doing my best to unscrew Tumblr's 2019 colour scheme
additional_info:
Version 1.0
-Reverts the blue (actually, I believe I used the blue from 2015 or so, if your have the hex code for the most recent previous blue, let me know and I'll make another version with that blue)
-Reverts new post button colours
-Slightly lightens all post text
-Lightens post buttons, urls, and tags
-Reverts activity icon colours

Version 1.1
-Reverted a few notification icons I missed (for link and audio posts) as well as the audio post colour

Version 1.15
-Reverted the "Publish" button on asks

Version 1.2
-Last update un-reverted the Next Page button. Re-reverted it.

Version 1.3
-Reverts the following: "Toastr" icons (the little notifications on the bottom right when a blog you get notifications from posts), the Anonymous toggle switch in the ask box, hyperlinks in the text editor.
-Also bolded the word "to" above the ask box because it looked weird to me unbolded and I could swear it used to be.

VERSION 2.0 (18 Feb 2019)
-Tumblr tried to screw with things again! I've created a wall of redundancies to hopefully avoid this plugin breaking again.
-I also got around to making this work on the header bar on blog archive pages

Version 2.01 (literally 10 minutes after the last one)
-Also what the heck they changed the tag editor hover style? Changed that back, as best as I could remember it being anyway. It's not blue anymore is my point.

Version 2.1
-Missed the dashboard blog sidebar overlay somehow whoops.

Version 2.2
-Fixed the dashboard blog sidebar overlay AGAIN why do they keep changing this one specific line
